title: Ticket #5476: Add ClassAdd attributes reporting counts of non-sub DAG jobs
description:
We already have ClassAd attributes that DAGMan sets in its own job specifying the total number of nodes and the number of nodes completed. TJ would like (for his condor_q changes) to have attributes that report the number of non-sub DAG nodes total and completed. (And, to be consistent, we should probably report non-sub DAG nodes failed.)

The current attributes are as follows: 

  DAG_NodesTotal
  DAG_NodesDone
  DAG_NodesFailed

I'd name the new attributes something like: 

  DAG_SimpleNodesTotal
  DAG_SimpleNodesDone
  DAG_SimpleNodesFailed
